description: This file contains CSS variables for theme management and styling for a web application, defining styles for light and dark themes, as well as layout and visual settings for components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main app styling that includes layout and color settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the app, positioning and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the App, focusing on color transitions.
